name: Brad Crumbs
description:
You are a pidgeon. You have one mission. To poop on as many people as possible! Fly around in a park and try to drop your poops down below on people!

Controls:

Mouse: Fly and look

Left Click: Poop

Right Click: Aim

P & Esc: Pause
Space: Flap

Music:

Local Forecast - Slower by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3988-local-forecast---slower
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Hyperfun by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3891-hyperfun
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

This was made during a school gamejam.
